participant_1.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my job
i eat all take out.
i have a marketing job.
i have always had long hair.
my hobbies include reading and cycling.

participant_2.background:
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I'm not married, but I love my new sweater.
I exercise every day for an hour because it helps me stay fit and healthy.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Pretty good! I got to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
That sounds like fun! I love riding my bike too.
Me too! It's a great way to get exercise and have some fun.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods, listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers, and watching old Thierry Henry videos.
Oh, I love cooking too! I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new things.
I'm sure you're better than you think! I love trying new recipes and learning about different cultures.
Me too! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
Have you ever tried cooking Indian food?
No, I haven't! Is it hard to make?
Not at all! It's actually pretty easy. I can give you some recipes if you want.
That would be great! I would love to try some Indian food.
Sure! I'll send you some recipes later
